<html><head><script type="text/javascript">document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {jQuery(document).ready(function(){if (jQuery('p .watermark').length > 0 ) {jQuery('p .watermark').parent().addClass('watermarked');jQuery('p .watermark').parent().each( function() {jQuery(this).children('img').attr('style', 'margin: 0 !important');jQuery(this).children().wrapAll('<div class="watermarked_image"></div>');});jQuery('.entry-content p.watermarked > div.watermarked_image > img').each( function() {if ( jQuery(this).hasClass('alignnone') ) {jQuery(this).parent().addClass( 'alignnone' );}if ( jQuery(this).hasClass('alignleft') ) {jQuery(this).parent().addClass( 'alignleft' );}if ( jQuery(this).hasClass('alignright') ) {jQuery(this).parent().addClass( 'alignright' );}if ( jQuery(this).hasClass('size-medium') ) {jQuery(this).parent().addClass( 'has-size-medium' );}if ( jQuery(this).hasClass('aligncenter') ) {jQuery(this).parent().addClass( 'aligncenter' );jQuery(this).parent().children().wrapAll('<div class="wm_centered"></div>');}});}});});</script></head><body><p style="text-align: center;">***THE DAILY PUBLIC SCHEDULE IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE***</p><p>SECRETARY ANTONY J. BLINKEN</p><p>Secretary Blinken is on travel to California<https://www.state.gov/secretary-blinkens-travel-to-california-october-16-17/> from October 16-17, 2022.</p><p>9:00 a.m. LOCAL Secretary Blinken visits the SLAC National Accelerator Laboratory with Speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi and House Member Anna Eshoo, in Menlo Park, California.;;;;</p><p>10:45 a.m. LOCAL Secretary Blinken and 66th Secretary of State Condoleezza Rice have a conversation on the evolution and importance of technology, diplomacy, and national security, in Stanford, California. BLINKEN</p><p>Secretary Blinken has no public appointments.</p></body></html>

Pleasesee the Secretary’s trip page<https://www.state.gov/secretary-blinkens-travel-to-cambodia-the-philippines-south-africa-the-democratic-republic-of-the-congo-and-rwanda/>for more information.</p><p>9:10 a.m. LOCAL Secretary Blinken holds a meet and greet with employees and families from U.S. Embassy Kinshasa in Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of the Congo.;;;;</p><p>10:20 a.m. LOCAL Secretary Blinken meets with Democratic Republic of the Congo Prime Minister Jean-Michel Sama Lukonde in Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of the Congo.;;;;</p><p>11:10 a.m. LOCAL Secretary Blinken participates in an election transparency hackathon event in Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of the Congo.;;;;</p><p>1:00 p.m. LOCAL Secretary Blinken meets with civil society representatives from eastern Democratic Republic of the Congo in Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of the Congo.;;;;</p><p>DEPUTY SECRETARY WENDY R. SHERMAN</p><p>Deputy Secretary Sherman attends meetings and briefings at the Department of State.</p><p>DEPUTY SECRETARY FOR MANAGEMENT AND RESOURCES BRIAN P. MCKEON</p><p>Deputy Secretary McKeon attends meetings and briefings at the Department of State.</p><p>UNDER SECRETARY FOR POLITICAL AFFAIRS VICTORIA J. NULAND</p><p>Under Secretary Nuland has no public appointments.</p><p>BRIEFING SCHEDULE</p><p>No Department Press Briefing.</p><p><input type="hidden" data-filter="100001000111"/></p></body></html>
<html><head><script type="text/javascript">document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {jQuery(document).ready(function(){if (jQuery('p .watermark').length > 0 ) {jQuery('p .watermark').parent().addClass('watermarked');jQuery('p .watermark').parent().each( function() {jQuery(this).children('img').attr('style', 'margin: 0 !important');jQuery(this).children().wrapAll('<div class="watermarked_image"></div>');});jQuery('.entry-content p.watermarked > div.watermarked_image > img').each( function() {if ( jQuery(this).hasClass('alignnone') ) {jQuery(this).parent().addClass( 'alignnone' );}if ( jQuery(this).hasClass('alignleft') ) {jQuery(this).parent().addClass( 'alignleft' );}if ( jQuery(this).hasClass('alignright') ) {jQuery(this).parent().addClass( 'alignright' );}if ( jQuery(this).hasClass('size-medium') ) {jQuery(this).parent().addClass( 'has-size-medium' );}if ( jQuery(this).hasClass('aligncenter') ) {jQuery(this).parent().addClass( 'aligncenter' );jQuery(this).parent().children().wrapAll('<div class="wm_centered"></div>');}});}});});</script></head><body><p>***THE DAILY PUBLIC SCHEDULE IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE***</p><p>SECRETARY ANTONY J. MCKEONDeputy Secretary McKeon has no public appointments.</p><p>UNDER SECRETARY FOR POLITICAL AFFAIRS VICTORIA J. NULAND</p><p>Under Secretary Nuland has no public appointments.</p><p>ASSISTANT SECRETARY FOR CONSULAR AFFAIRS RENA BITTER </p><p>Assistant Secretary Bitter is on travel to Japan, Indonesia, Singapore, the Philippines, and California from April 12-22, 2022. Please click here<https://www.state.gov/secretary-blinkens-travel-to-israel-the-west-bank-morocco-and-algeria/> for more information.</p><p>10:10 a.m. LOCAL Secretary Blinken participates in the Negev Summit with Israeli Foreign Minister Yair Lapid, Bahraini Foreign Minister Dr. Abdullatif bin Rashid Al Zayani, Egyptian Foreign Minister Sameh Shoukry, Moroccan Foreign Minister Nasser Bourita, and UAE Foreign Minister Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed Al Nahyan in Sde Boker.;;;;</p><p>12:35 p.m. LOCAL Secretary Blinken, Israeli Foreign Minister Yair Lapid, Bahraini Foreign Minister Dr. Abdullatif bin Rashid Al Zayani, Egyptian Foreign Minister Sameh Shoukry, Moroccan Foreign Minister Nasser Bourita, and UAE Foreign Minister Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed Al Nahyan deliver statements to the press in Sde Boker.;;;;</p><p>1:45 p.m. LOCAL Secretary Blinken visits David Ben Gurion Memorial National Park with Israeli Foreign Minister Yair Lapid.;;;;</p><p>DEPUTY SECRETARY OF STATE WENDY R. SHERMAN</p><p>1:00 p.m. Deputy Secretary Sherman meets with Israeli Knesset Speaker Mickey Levy at the Department of State.;;;;</p><p>4:00 p.m. Deputy Secretary Sherman meets with Rwandan Minister of Foreign Affairs Vincent Biruta at the Department of State.;;;;</p><p>DEPUTY SECRETARY FOR MANAGEMENT AND RESOURCES BRIAN P. MCKEON</p><p>4:00 p.m. Deputy Secretary McKeon and USAID Deputy Administrator Paloma Adams-Allen hold a telephonic briefing on the FY2023 Budget Rollout from the Department of State.;;;;</p><p>UNDER SECRETARY FOR POLITICAL AFFAIRS VICTORIA J. NULAND</p><p>Under Secretary Nuland attends meetings and briefings at the Department of State.</p><p>UNDER SECRETARY FOR ARMS CONTROL AND INTERNATIONAL SECURITY BONNIE D. MCKEON</p><p>Deputy Secretary McKeon attends meetings and briefings, from the Department of State.</p><p>UNDER SECRETARY FOR POLITICAL AFFAIRS DAVID HALE</p><p>Under Secretary Hale attends meetings and briefings, from the Department of State.</p><p>BRIEFING SCHEDULE </p><p>2:00 p.m. Department Press Briefing by Spokesperson Ned Price.;;;;;;;;www.state.gov<https://www.state.gov/>.</p><p></p></body></html>
